attributes.action: Save Walker Welfare again @ Thornhill Dewsbury
attributes.additional_details:
Walker Welfare is under threat of being demolished. This is building is in the heart of the village. In 2008 it was earmarked £1000.00 to repair by Kirklees MC. Unfortunately the funding never materialised.
This building has seen many generations pass through its doors and to lose this building under these circumstances is devasting.
Please support our cause.
